text.title: Research on the Relationship between Price Mechanism and Short-Term Behavior in Chinese Farmland Trusteeships

head.s: Results of Equilibrium under the Fixed-Price System

p.s: The game between farmers and agricultural social service providers is a dynamic game .
This study applied backward induction to estimate , first , the agricultural social service provider ’s strategic choices and then , the farmers ’ decisions .

head.s: Results of Equilibrium under the Variable Price System

p.s: The calculation of game results under the variable-price system is similar to that under the fixed-price system , namely estimating the agricultural social service provider ’s strategic choices first and then the farmer ’s strategic choices .
